translations: 牺牲，损失；献身，供奉（sacrifice 的复数）
牺牲，损失（sacrifice 的单三形式）

sentences.sentence: Most have worked their guts out and made sacrifices.
sentences.translation: 大多数人都拼命工作并做出了牺牲。

sentences.sentence: She made many sacrifices to get Anita a good education.
sentences.translation: 为了让安尼塔受到良好教育，她做出了很多牺牲。

sentences.sentence: She emphasized that their plan would mean sacrifices and hard work.
sentences.translation: 她强调说他们的计划将意味着牺牲和辛勤工作。
